Description: npmpkgx - Automatically add project dependencies to npm's package.json

Arguments.<path>: The path to the directory containing the application files for the package.json file generated by npm

Options.-p, --save-prefix <prefix>: Customize the prefix(^|~|<|>|=) for package version
Options.--encoding <charset>: Use encoding parameter for package.json write. The default value of charset is utf-8 if not specified
Options.--registry <url?>: Switch online mode, it will search the nodejs registry. The default value of url is 'https://registry.npmjs.org' if not specified
